Schema Type: Schemas of Self-Worth and Achievement (Growth & Meaning)
Root Causes (Childhood Drivers): Early affection/praise was contingent on flawless performance; high parental criticism; the belief that "I am only good if I am perfect."
Symptoms & Behavioral Loops: Fear of failure leading to crippling procrastination or chronic overworking; setting impossibly high standards; inability to accept praise; constant feeling of being a fraud.
Projections & Manifestations (Psychologi: Psychological: Imposter syndrome, shame spiral, anxiety, chronic low self-esteem. Physiological: Insomnia, GI distress, muscle tension, burnout.

Schema Type: Schemas of Self-Worth and Achievement (Growth & Meaning)
Root Causes (Childhood Drivers): Repeated experience where effort yielded no predictable reward or outcome; lack of autonomy (e.g., in chaotic or abusive homes).
Symptoms & Behavioral Loops: Low initiative; belief that external forces (luck, "the universe") dictate life; apathy; avoidance of planning; failing to attempt challenges, leading to stagnation.
Projections & Manifestations (Psychologi: Psychological: Apathy, chronic depression, external locus of control. Physiological: Low energy, unmanaged stress, poor financial planning.

Schema Type: Schemas of Self-Worth and Achievement (Growth & Meaning)
Root Causes (Childhood Drivers): Belief that talent/ability is innate and cannot be improved (often instilled by labeling); avoidance of vulnerability/mistakes.
Symptoms & Behavioral Loops: Resistance to change; giving up easily when a task requires effort; viewing failure as a sign of permanent stupidity; defensive response to constructive criticism.
Projections & Manifestations (Psychologi: Psychological: Intellectual stagnation, inability to adapt to new work/life environments. Physiological: Stress response from trying to maintain a facade of competence.

Schema Type: Schemas of Self-Worth and Achievement (Growth & Meaning)
Root Causes (Childhood Drivers): Constant criticism or high shame/blame during childhood ; internalization of parental harshness.
Symptoms & Behavioral Loops: Inability to forgive oneself; chronic guilt; self-sabotage when success is imminent; tendency to focus exclusively on negatives; minimizing achievements.
Projections & Manifestations (Psychologi: Psychological: High anxiety, chronic guilt, self-hatred, low vitality. Physiological: Self-neglect, chronic pain, increased reliance on coping mechanisms.

Schema Type: Schemas of Relationship and Attachment (Connection)
Root Causes (Childhood Drivers): Inconsistent caregiving; threats of loss or separation (e.g., divorce, hospitalization).
Symptoms & Behavioral Loops: Hyper-vigilance in relationships; high need for reassurance; chronic insecurity; often misinterpreting neutral actions as signs of rejection; difficulty being alone.
Projections & Manifestations (Psychologi: Psychological: Relationship cycling (seek/reject), panic, intense mood swings linked to relational status. Physiological: Anxiety, hyper-arousal, poor sleep.

Schema Type: Schemas of Relationship and Attachment (Connection)
Root Causes (Childhood Drivers): Emotional neglect ; emotional invalidation; being punished for emotional expression; high self-reliance as survival mechanism.
Symptoms & Behavioral Loops: Emotional numbing ; difficulty with vulnerability ; inability to initiate closeness ; prioritizing independence over intimacy; feeling drained by social interaction.
Projections & Manifestations (Psychologi: Psychological: Loneliness, inability to access emotional support, surface-level relationships. Physiological: Suppression of feelings contributing to physical tension.

Schema Type: Schemas of Relationship and Attachment (Connection)
Root Causes (Childhood Drivers): Affection/safety conditional on compliance and suppressing needs ; needing to "parent" a caregiver.
Symptoms & Behavioral Loops: Chronic inability to say 'no'; resentment; over-giving ; emotional exhaustion ; lack of genuine connection because of masked self.
Projections & Manifestations (Psychologi: Psychological: Burnout, internalized rage, resentment, low engagement. Physiological: Chronic fatigue, tension headaches, frequent illness.

Schema Type: Schemas of Relationship and Attachment (Connection)
Root Causes (Childhood Drivers): Developing screens as an early soothing/coping mechanism; social anxiety leading to digital withdrawal.
Symptoms & Behavioral Loops: Productivity sabotage; addiction to social media ; loss of control over time ; replacing reciprocal relationships with passive digital consumption.
Projections & Manifestations (Psychologi: Psychological: Increased anxiety, depression, sense of detachment. Physiological: Sleep disruption, eye strain, poor posture, low physical vitality.

Schema Type: Schemas of Resource and Security (Stability & Environment)
Root Causes (Childhood Drivers): Experiencing or witnessing severe financial struggle; parents having chronic money stress .
Symptoms & Behavioral Loops: Chronic anxiety about money; inability to plan/invest; either hoarding resources or impulsive spending to compensate for deprivation; debt stress.
Projections & Manifestations (Psychologi: Psychological: High chronic anxiety, panic attacks when discussing money. Physiological: Stress-related sleep issues, constant low-grade stress .

Schema Type: Schemas of Resource and Security (Stability & Environment)
Root Causes (Childhood Drivers): Growing up in disorganized, chaotic, or unsafe homes/neighborhoods .
Symptoms & Behavioral Loops: High tolerance for clutter and disorder; inability to focus due to environment ; prioritizing ease over comfort/functionality; neglecting personal space needs .
Projections & Manifestations (Psychologi: Psychological: Diffuse anxiety, reduced focus, low sense of control, Physiological: Chronic low-grade stress, lack of restful relaxation.

Schema Type: Schemas of Resource and Security (Stability & Environment)
Root Causes (Childhood Drivers): Exposure to violence, instability, or physical danger in the home or neighborhood .
Symptoms & Behavioral Loops: Hyper-vigilance ; difficulty feeling truly safe or relaxed in any environment ; constantly anticipating worst-case scenarios ; struggle with emotional regulation.
Projections & Manifestations (Psychologi: Psychological: PTSD, generalized anxiety, difficulty trusting stability. Physiological: Hyper-arousal, difficulty sleeping, high heart rate, suppressed immune function.

Schema Type: Schemas of Well-Being and Engagement (Vitality & Meaning)
Root Causes (Childhood Drivers): Unmanaged stress; long-term emotional suppression ; ignoring early physical warning signs .
Symptoms & Behavioral Loops: Persistent low energy ; reliance on stimulants/sedatives; neglecting basic self-care; prioritizing external demands over rest; poor sleep hygiene.
Projections & Manifestations (Psychologi: Psychological: Low mood, irritability, reduced patience. Physiological: Burnout, chronic illness, pain interference, frequent illness.

Schema Type: Schemas of Well-Being and Engagement (Vitality & Meaning)
Root Causes (Childhood Drivers): Lack of role models for passion/purpose; focus solely on external achievement without internal fulfillment.
Symptoms & Behavioral Loops: Feeling aimless or drifting ; low engagement in daily activities ; inability to define goals ); seeking external novelty without inner satisfaction.
Projections & Manifestations (Psychologi: Psychological: Existential anxiety, depression, restlessness, low optimism. Physiological: Lack of motivation leading to low physical activity.

Schema Type: Schemas of Well-Being and Engagement (Vitality & Meaning)
Root Causes (Childhood Drivers): Environment of constant criticism or failure without support; emotional dampening .
Symptoms & Behavioral Loops: Expecting negative outcomes; inability to sustain a positive mood; minimizing success; quick discouragement from setbacks .
Projections & Manifestations (Psychologi: Psychological: Low trait optimism, persistent unhappiness, self-fulfilling negative prophecies. Physiological: Increased cortisol (stress hormone) due to constant low mood.

Schema Type: Schemas of Well-Being and Engagement (Vitality & Meaning)
Root Causes (Childhood Drivers): Unresolved childhood losses (death, separation, abandonment) without space to grieve.
Symptoms & Behavioral Loops: Difficulty identifying emotions ; emotional rigidity; holding grudges; avoidance of deep relationships ; reliance on logic over feeling.
Projections & Manifestations (Psychologi: Psychological: Difficulty with empathy, emotional flatness, inability to move on. Physiological: Physical blocks, psychosomatic pain, low vitality.

Schema Type: Cross-Cutting and Complex Schemas
Root Causes (Childhood Drivers): Undiagnosed ADHD or poor modeling of structure/organization in youth; anxiety causing cognitive overload.
Symptoms & Behavioral Loops: Chronic procrastination (Q33); missing deadlines; inability to focus (Q4); constant feeling of overwhelm; inability to break down complex goals.
Projections & Manifestations (Psychologi: Psychological: Guilt, stress, feeling incompetent. Physiological: High-stress hormones, low energy.

Schema Type: Cross-Cutting and Complex Schemas
Root Causes (Childhood Drivers): Lack of clear consequences in childhood; high shame leading to deflection.
Symptoms & Behavioral Loops: Blaming external factors for problems; inability to sustain effort ; avoiding decisions ; failing to set boundaries ; financial irresponsibility.
Projections & Manifestations (Psychologi: Psychological: External locus of control, emotional immaturity, failure to mature professionally. Physiological: Low motivation.

Schema Type: Cross-Cutting and Complex Schemas
Root Causes (Childhood Drivers): Betrayal or repeated disappointment by caregivers or authority figures.
Symptoms & Behavioral Loops: Inability to delegate ; refusing help; difficulty in relationships that require shared vulnerability ; reluctance to trust partners/colleagues.
Projections & Manifestations (Psychologi: Psychological: Isolation, resentment toward others, chronic self-reliance stress. Physiological: High stress, difficulty relaxing.

Schema Type: Cross-Cutting and Complex Schemas
Root Causes (Childhood Drivers): Lack of social integration or modeling of community service; high focus on self-interest due to scarcity.
Symptoms & Behavioral Loops: Low interest in others' lives; reluctance to contribute; feeling detached from local groups/issues ; self-focus over collective good.
Projections & Manifestations (Psychologi: Psychological: Isolation, cynicism, reduced sense of meaning. Physiological: Lack of connection benefits (higher stress).

Schema Type: Cross-Cutting and Complex Schemas
Root Causes (Childhood Drivers): Direct exposure to high-impact Adverse Childhood Experiences (abuse, violence, mental illness).
Symptoms & Behavioral Loops: Baseline anxiety ; flashbacks/triggers; chronic self-sabotage; difficulty maintaining stability ; severe distrust; poor emotional regulation.
Projections & Manifestations (Psychologi: Psychological: CPTSD, severe anxiety, depression, mood disorders. Physiological: Autoimmune issues, high pain sensitivity, chronic illness.
